# THINK

Attaining greatness is not a day job. The dream of yesterday is the reality of today and the vision of tomorrow. The way you perceive people does not mean that is the way they see themselves. 

You might see me as a weak person but I see myself as a giant. I am a student studying medicine, doesn't mean I am a medical doctor at heart, Being a medical student doesn't guarantee my success as a medical student. I might be a medical student, and my heart would be at the golf club.

title: Expecting Victory Through Praise
body:
http://glorygod.do.am/Images/Praise-praise_God.jpg

It is a common thing to praise Jehovah when good things happen or when everything is rosy. However, it takes real courage to offer praise when you have a tough problem.

When the wind appears to blow contrary, many people don't see any reason for thanking God. Why? This is because they often want to know **the direction Jehovah was looking before the wind arose**. They become weary, frustrated and dejected in the face of troubles. They think He is either distant from them or He does not really care for them! Friend, let me tell you one thing that gives victory when life seems to be adversely dealing with you.

Praising God in the time of adversity is a proven way to victory. Although, it is not a natural response to battles of life, but i encourage you to always praise Jehovah.

Praise invites the presence of God and paves way for his power to manifest. Praise passes your prayer to God. It helps you place your trust in God and takes you away from problems.
